name: twilreapi-sidekiq
description: A sidekiq worker process for Twilreapi

REDIS_URL.description: Required. Should match the REDIS_URL defined in your Twilreapi application

TWILREAPI_SIDEKIQ_QUEUES.description: Required. The queues in which to run in order of priority separated by colons(:). E.g. outbound_calls_queue:default:low_priority.

TWILREAPI_SIDEKIQ_OUTBOUND_CALL_WORKER_C.description: Required. The name of the sidekiq worker class for running outbound calls. This class needs to be the same as the the class defined in ACTIVE_JOB_SIDEKIQ_OUTBOUND_CALL_WORKER_CLASS in your Twilreapi application

TWILREAPI_SIDEKIQ_OUTBOUND_CALL_WORKER_D.description: Required. The URL of the DRb instance to connect to for initiating outbound calls.
